plot: A collection of live performances and a glimpse of the road from Bill Callahan's American leg of the 2011 Apocalypse tour.
title: Apocalypse: A Bill Callahan Tour Film
plot_es: A collection of live performances and a glimpse of the road from Bill Callahan's American leg of the 2011 Apocalypse tour.
original_name: Apocalypse: A Bill Callahan Tour Film
plot_en: A collection of live performances and a glimpse of the road from Bill Callahan's American leg of the 2011 Apocalypse tour.
